titles.title: Monster Hunter Stories: Ride On
モンスターハンターストーリーズ RIDE ON
Monster Hunter Stories: Ride On
Monster Hunter Stories
怪物猎人物语 RIDE ON

anime.description: * Based on Monster Hunter Stories RPG by http://anidb.net/cr1283 [Capcom] In a world where people and monsters are at odds, some learn to coexist. Known as Riders, they awaken the powers of monsters and live alongside them in secrecy. Now, one young http://anidb.net/ch82191 [boy] journeys to find his own companion and become the world`s greatest Rider. Source: crunchyroll

externalentity.identifier: モンスターハンター_ストーリーズ

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: RPG
tag.description: Any anime that is based on a role-playing game aka RPG. A role-playing video game is a video game which includes elements of non-electronic role-playing games. The player assumes control of one or several fictional characters (a party) who have joined forces in order to perform quests and overcome a great number of challenges and enemies, usually monsters inspired by fantasy, and, to a lesser extent, science fiction and classic mythology. During the course of the game the characters, or avatars, which are generally defined by quantized characteristics, evolve and improve in that their various attributes increase, as well as by gaining more powerful artefacts.

episode.title: 絆あわせの儀式
The Kinship Rite
Kizuna Awase no Gishiki
episode.summary: Chief Omna sends the apprentice Riders off in search of the Waterfall of Trials. A visitor to Hakum Village gives Lilia inspiration for her future. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶対強者
Absolute Power
Zettai Kyousha
episode.summary: A Hunter is headed for secretive Hakum Village. He`s sure to have his own way of dealing with all these monsters showing up where they don`t belong... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オトモン誕生!
A Monstie Is Born!
Otomon Tanjou!
episode.summary: It`s Kinship Rite time! Lilia and Cheval are uncertain about their futures, while an unexpected attack on Hakum Village sends its Riders scrambling. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絆の力
The Power of Bonds
Kizuna no Chikara
episode.summary: Aspiring young Rider Lute and friends go in search of a Monstie Egg on the eve of the Kinship Rite--a search that takes them into dangerous territory. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナビルーの恋
Navirou in Love
Navirou no Koi
episode.summary: Ms. Pink the traveling merchant stops by the village, and Navirou falls hard for her Airou assistant Mocha. How far will he go in the name of love? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドリンコはママの味
Like Mom Used to Make
Dorinko wa Mama no Aji
episode.summary: The mischievous twins Den-Den and Lin-Lin are stirring up trouble in Hakum Village--and run into trouble of their own in the forboding woods at night. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 金のたまごクエスト
Quest for the Golden Egg
Kin no Tamago Quest
episode.summary: Lute and friends dream about what they`d buy with the proceeds from a rare and valuable golden Gargwa egg, and Cheval decides to try hunting one down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オトモンレース
Off to the Monstie Races
Otomon Race
episode.summary: Hakum Village revives the beloved Monstie Races for their four newest Riders, but Lute could still use a lot more practice piloting his powerful pal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルガクルガ襲来
Invasion of the Nargacuga
Nargacuga Shuurai
episode.summary: A Blight-mad Nargacuga attacks the village, leaving a trail of blind destruction in its wake as Riders young and old do all they can to drive it away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嵐の前
Before the Storm
Arashi no Mae
episode.summary: Lilia leads her friends into the woods to investigate the evil changes taking place. There they learn about a legendary Rider--and about Lute`s folks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 災厄の予兆
Portent of Disaster
Saiyaku no Yochou
episode.summary: In the latest ill omen, the village`s beneficial wind turns violent. Hyoro struggles to live up to the expectations of his demanding brother Genie. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DSZ (ダンとシルバのゼッコーチョー!)
DSZ (Dan and Silva`s Zeal!)
DSZ (Dan to Silva no Zekkouchou!)
episode.summary: Dan has doubts about whether he should be leading the Riders in training, and remembers his old friend Silva, who was once a shoo-in to be the leader. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リオレイア誕生!
A Lioleia Is Born!
Lioleia Tanjou!
episode.summary: There`s no time to clean up after the Nargacuga when it could attack the village again at any moment. Cheval swears revenge and takes a new Monstie. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なぞなぞじいさん登場!
Meet the Riddlemaster
Nazonazo Jii-san Toujou!
episode.summary: Lute, Navirou, and Avinia encounter an enigmatic, riddle-loving innkeeper who stands between them and the help Avinia needs for her beloved Monstie. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アユリアの秘密
Avinia`s Secret
Ayuria no Himitsu
episode.summary: Having started their journey outside the village, Lute and Navirou get separated from the others, and find a girl who is hurt and in need of help. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旅立ちの日
The Journey Begins
Tabidachi no Hi
episode.summary: The time has come for the young Riders to venture forth beyond Hakum Village, accompanied by excitement, responsibility, and not a little trepidation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 立ち向かえ! 黒の凶気!
Face the Black Blight!
Tachimukae! Kuro no Kyouki!
episode.summary: The apprentice Riders go off on their own to face the Blighted Nargacuga, but it`s going to be tough with Lute`s Monstie still recovering back home... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ニクキュー村の伝説
The Legend of Pawpad Place
Nikukyuu Mura no Densetsu
episode.summary: Lute and Lilia stumble across a Felyne village while searching for a Kinship Ore. Navirou is confronted by a strange Felyne who insists they`re pals. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 急襲! ネルスキュラ
Nerscylla Blitz!
Kyuushuu! Nerskyura
episode.summary: It`s questing time in the Hunter city of Gildegaran! A task that looks like a piece of cake winds up being more than Lute and Navirou bargained for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 到着! ギルデカラン
Welcome to Gildegaran
Touchaku! Guildekaran
episode.summary: Lute and friends are dazzled by the big city, but they soon get down to business: finding the Scriveners and a way to keep the Black Blight in check. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空の飛竜, 陸の飛竜
Sky Wyvern, Land Wyvern
Sora no Hiryuu, Riku no Hiryuu
episode.summary: The rift deepens between fellow Riders Lute and Cheval as their attitudes toward rogue monsters drift further apart. Lute reunites with an old friend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 角竜慟哭
The Horned Wyvern`s Lament
Tsunoryuu Doukoku
episode.summary: Dan and the other senior Riders meet up with Lute`s party in the desert, where Chief Nolma shares some info that changes the course of their quest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 砂漠からの救援依頼
Desert Mayday
Sabaku kara no Kyuuen Irai
episode.summary: The group meets with Hunter opposition in the Oasum refugee camp. A desert battle with a Blighted monster gets an unexpected--and unwelcome--assist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 土砂竜ボルボロス!!
Barroth, Landslide Wyvern
Dosha Ryuu Borboros!!
episode.summary: Lilia brings the young Riders a request from the Scriveners that sends them through a vast desert in search of a solution to the Black Blight problem. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死闘! 角竜ディアブロス!
Diabolical Diablos, Horned Wyvern
Shitou! Tsunoryuu Diablos!
episode.summary: After proving their mettle against the Blighted Diablos near the ruins of Reverto`s hometown, the Riders reach an understanding about the road ahead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 進め! ナンバーズ!
Onward, Numbers!
Susume! Numbers!
episode.summary: Discarded like so much trash, Navirou happens to reunite with some old friends. If only he could remember them--or the grand plans they had to escape. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドヴァン火山の記憶
Dovan Volcano Memories
Dovan Kazan no Kioku
episode.summary: Why does Navirou`s head hurt at the very mention of the Dovan Volcano? Lute runs into a couple of troublemakers en route to the next Kinship Ore. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎の白い竜
The Mysterious White Dragon
Nazo no Shiroi Ryuu
episode.summary: Lute wants the same Monstie as the legendary hero Redan--and Debli`s teacher seems to know where to find precisely the Monster Egg he`s looking for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リュート沈没? 空中大決戦!
All-Out Airborne Assault!
Ryuuto Chinbotsu? Kuuchuu Dai Kessen!
episode.summary: There`s a Blighted monster on Naubaka Island, but no one who sails there comes back. Lute and friends brave the waves with the unique Bandit Captain. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 森となり獣となれ
Be the Forest, Be the Beast
Mori to Nari Kemono to Nare
episode.summary: Lute and Reverto track a monster into a mine, despite rumors that it`s haunted. Never mind what they find--what`s more worrying is what finds THEM. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決別の時
Parting Ways
Ketsubetsu no Toki
episode.summary: Bent on destroying Blighted monsters, Cheval confronts Lute over his beloved Monstie Ratha, who may not even have the strength to defend himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 火の海に棲む竜
The Dragon in the Sea of Fire
Hi no Umi ni Sumu Ryuu
episode.summary: Lute and the Numbers face off against Dr. Manelger in his subterranean lab, where the mad scientist has an unpleasant mechanized surprise for them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マネルガー博士を追え!
The Great Manelger Chase
Manelger-hakase o Oe!
episode.summary: Lute follows a tip from the Scriveners to outside Albrachs Village as he tracks down Dr. Manelger, where he gets Hunter help--and a Hunter headache. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白き竜のタマゴ
The White Dragon`s Egg
Shiroki Ryuu no Tamago
episode.summary: Lilia has a strong lead on the whereabouts of the legendary white dragon`s egg that sends Lute and friends into the ruins of the hero Redan`s village. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レインボービーチを封鎖せよ!
Rainbow Beach Blockade!
Rainbow Beach o Fuusa Seyo!
episode.summary: Chief Mallerie`s pickle weight has been stolen! Never fear: Detective Navirou is on the case. Meanwhile, Lute searches for Naubaka`s Kinship Ore. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒狼鳥の逆襲
The Wolf Raven Strikes Back
Kokurouchou no Gyakushuu
episode.summary: Lute and Avinia must defend lovely Koapni Village from the Blighted monster that`s been terrorizing the island. Pansy has a big favor to ask Navirou. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 撃滅のブラキディオス
Brachydios the Destroyer
Gekimetsu no Brachydios
episode.summary: Lute accompanies Reverto on a quest to slay Brachydios the Destroyer, an ultra-powerful tempered monster and the expert Hunter`s longtime rival. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 試練! 蜃気楼の塔へ
Tested at the Tower of Illusion
Shiren! Shinkirou no Tou e
episode.summary: Chief Omna brings Lute to the Tower of Illusion, where he undergoes a tense trial meant to dispel the doubt from his mind and lead him to the truth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小さな花束
The Little Bouquet
Chiisana Hanataba
episode.summary: Cheval is back in Hakum Village! He may be too late to slay the Blighted beast, but he sticks around to confront and challenge his former friend Lute. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハクム村の危機, 再び!
Trouble Returns to Hakum
Hakum Mura no Kiki, Futatabi!
episode.summary: A second Kinship Ore in Hakum Village? Lute returns to his hometown just in time to deal with the devastating fallout of the mad Manelger`s meddling. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナンバーズ, 全員集合!
Numbers, Assemble!
Numbers, Zen`in Shuugou!
episode.summary: Lute and Navirou reunite with the Numbers as they search for another Kinship Ore on Mt. Rhyz, where some unexpected company puts their plans on hold. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルガクルガ再び
The Nargacuga Returns
Nargacuga Futatabi
episode.summary: Cheval takes on an unexpected--and hopefully more obedient--new Monstie before he and his team head to the desert to find a Black Diablos run amok. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 摩訶不思議! 幻獣キリンとの遭遇
A Mystical Meeting with Kirin
Makafushigi! Genjuu Kirin to no Souguu
episode.summary: The team has a rare encounter with a mysterious Elder Dragon deep in the Forest of Confusion as they continue their search for the Kinship Ore. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迷いの森
Forest of Confusion
Mayoi no Mori
episode.summary: Some familiar faces rejoin Lute on his journey into the Forest of Confusion, hot on the trail of the next Kinship Ore. But the Blight is spreading... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白い奇跡
A Miracle in White
Shiroi Kiseki
episode.summary: Lute and Ratha`s pitched battle with the formidable Black Dread rages on, but Lute`s secret weapon--the power of Kinship--may finally turn the tide. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦! 最凶の黒
This Is It: The Black Dread
Kessen! Saikyou no Kuro
episode.summary: Lute and Cheval face the staggeringly powerful Black Dread, a monster capable of wiping entire villages off the map; Ratha has a fight of his own. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誕生! 伝説の白き竜
The Legendary White Dragon Is Born!
Tanjou! Densetsu no Shiroki Ryuu
episode.summary: Cheval flexes his newfound muscle with his white dragon Monstie, but even he`s not safe from the Black Blight. Lute seeks a chance to patch things up. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: セリオン山の恐暴竜
The Deviljho of Mt. Celion
Celionzan no Kyoubouryuu
episode.summary: The final Kinship Ore waits amid freezing mountain ruins. Lute and Manelger are in hot pursuit, but Cheval`s new Mechinship Stone changes everything. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 森の忍者, シャドウ参上!
Episode 52
Mori no Ninja, Shadow Sanjou!
空前絶後のナルシスト!? マッド見参!
Episode 51
Kuuzenzetsugo no Narcissist! Mad Kenzan!
襲来! ブラックライダーズ!
Attack of the Ebon Riders!
Shuurai! Black Riders!
がんばれ! ドスランポス
Episode 53
Ganbare! Dosranpos
オトモンレース, 再び!
Episode 60
Otomon Race, Futatabi!
ナビルーおなら大作戦!
Episode 58
Nabiruu Onara Daisakusen!
アユリア, 救出大作戦!
Episode 63
Ayuria, Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!
復活? マネルガー博士!
Episode 61
Fukkatsu? Manelger-hakase!
クシャルダオラの進撃
Episode 71
Kusharudaora no Shingeki
アンヴィスというライダー
Episode 70
Anvis to Iu Rider
風と雲と歌と
Episode 74
Kaze to Kumo to Uta to
